member.name: F:Pdftools.Pdf.PDFAnnotationFlag.eAnnotInvisible
member.summary: If set, do not display the annotation.

member.name: F:Pdftools.Pdf.PDFAnnotationFlag.eAnnotHidden
member.summary: If set, do not display or print the annotation or allow it to interact with the user.

member.name: F:Pdftools.Pdf.PDFAnnotationFlag.eAnnotPrint
member.summary: If set, print the annotation when the page is printed.

member.name: F:Pdftools.Pdf.PDFAnnotationFlag.eAnnotNoZoom
member.summary: If set, do not scale the annotation’s appearance to match the magnification of the page

member.name: F:Pdftools.Pdf.PDFAnnotationFlag.eAnnotNoRotate
member.summary: If set, do not rotate the annotation’s appearance to match the rotation of the page

member.name: F:Pdftools.Pdf.PDFAnnotationFlag.eAnnotNoView
member.summary: If set, do not display the annotation on the screen or allow it to interact with the user.

member.name: F:Pdftools.Pdf.PDFAnnotationFlag.eAnnotReadOnly
member.summary: If set, do not allow the annotation to interact with the user.

member.name: F:Pdftools.Pdf.PDFAnnotationFlag.eAnnotLocked
member.summary: If set, do not allow the annotation to be deleted or its properties (including position and size) to be modified by the user

member.name: F:Pdftools.Pdf.PDFAnnotationFlag.eAnnotToggleNoView
member.summary: If set, invert the interpretation of the NoView flag for certain events.

member.name: F:Pdftools.Pdf.PDFRecoveryOption.eRecoverXREF
member.summary: Recover XREF table. Useful if processing a document takes too long, since repairing the cross-reference table is very time consuming.

member.name: F:Pdftools.Pdf.PDFRecoveryOption.eRecoverPages
member.summary: If pages are not part of the page tree (loose pages), they will be recovered and added at the end of the document. Skipping this option will remove these pages from the document.

member.name: F:Pdftools.Pdf.PDFRecoveryOption.eRecoverImages
member.summary: Try to recover images of a PDF document if the document cannot be repaired.

member.summary: No compression (raw). color depths 1-8, 24

member.summary: Lossless flate (ZIP)compression. color depths 1-8, 24

member.summary: Lossless LZW (Lempel-Ziv-Welch) compression. color depths 2-8

member.summary: Lossless CCITT Fax Group3 compression. bitonal

member.summary: Lossless CCITT Fax Group3 (2D) compression. bitonal

member.name: F:Pdftools.Pdf.PDFCompression.eComprGroup4
member.summary: Lossless CCITT Fax Group4 compression. bitonal

member.name: F:Pdftools.Pdf.PDFCompression.eComprJBIG2
member.summary: Lossless JBGI2 compression. bitonal

member.name: F:Pdftools.Pdf.PDFCompression.eComprJPEG2000
member.summary: Lossy JPEG2000 compression. color depths 8, 24

member.summary: Unknown Compression
